meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics traditionally associated with masculinity to an extreme degree.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's costume was supermasculine, with muscles bulging everywhere.
meanings.sent2: He tried to act supermasculine by lifting heavy weights at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The tiny chihuahua tried to look supermasculine by growling at a big dog.
meanings.sent4: His deep voice was so supermasculine, it echoed through the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood tall and supermasculine against the sky.

meanings.definition: Exaggeratedly masculine in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler's outfit was supermasculine, covered in spikes and chains.
meanings.sent2: He adopted a supermasculine pose, puffing out his chest and flexing his muscles.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten tried to act supermasculine by pouncing on a toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: His cologne was so supermasculine, it made everyone in the room take notice.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm roared through the night, its power feeling supermasculine.
